text: Ngô Đức Thắng (born 4 May 1988) is a Vietnamese footballer who plays as either a midfielder or defenderfor Quảng Nam in the V.League 1. == References == Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Vietnamese footballers Category:V.League 1 players Category:Hà Nội F.C. players Category:Đồng Nai F.C. players Category:Than Quảng Ninh F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football defenders
title: Ngô Đức Thắng
